text: Guem, stage name of Abdelmajid Guemguem (9 March 1947 â€“ 22 January 2021) was an Algerian percussionist. He composed Le Serpent, re-recorded in 1996 for the program on France 2. In 2011, he composed Mon Paris. Guem died on 22 January 2021 in Paris, aged 73. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Algerian singers
title: Guem
